subject: Baseball
Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Shyam Das, who overturned Ryan Braun’s 50-game suspension for a positive drug test, was fired, according to a person in baseball with knowledge of the decision.
snippet: Shyam Das, who overturned Ryan Braun’s 50-game suspension for a positive drug test, was fired, according to a person in baseball with knowledge of the decision.
